  physical_appearance: The image shows nine black-and-white photographs. All of them are rectangular and seven of them are in landscape orientation while the other two are in portrait orientation. The photograph at the bottom right shows a person dressed in formal attire and holding a magician\u0027s hat and wand. Another photograph at the left hand side shows a woman reading and in the interior of a building. The settings of the other photographs are in this same room as well. An individual wearing a suit and tie
 with a hat
 is present in most of these photographs.

  sgcool_label_text: Pasted on the same album page
 these nine photographs show various recurring figures in two rooms. \r\n\r\nWith continuous improvement of camera technology
 it became possible to take photographs outside a studio in the first decades of the 20th century. Many middle-class families collected photographs in albums as a way of documenting family life
 or documentasi keluarga.

metadata.physical_appearance: The image shows nine black-and-white photographs. All of them are rectangular and seven of them are in landscape orientation while the other two are in portrait orientation. The photograph at the bottom right shows a person dressed in formal attire and holding a magician's hat and wand. Another photograph at the left hand side shows a woman reading and in the interior of a building. The settings of the other photographs are in this same room as well. An individual wearing a suit and tie, with a hat, is present in most of these photographs.

metadata.sgcool_label_text:
Pasted on the same album page, these nine photographs show various recurring figures in two rooms. 

With continuous improvement of camera technology, it became possible to take photographs outside a studio in the first decades of the 20th century. Many middle-class families collected photographs in albums as a way of documenting family life, or documentasi keluarga.
